title: Intersection of 'Dataset from 'Establecimientos Educativos Colombia 2007' with a 50km buffer' and 'WITS Colombia 2009 Terrorist Incidents'
name: Intersection of 'Dataset from 'Establecimientos Educativos Colombia 2007' with a 50km buffer' and 'WITS Colombia 2009 Terrorist Incidents'
